root.title: The Blind Man Joke
root.content: A blind man walks into a store with a seeing eye dog. Much to the store owners surprise the blind man picks up the dog by it’s tail and starts swinging it around over his head. Puzzled, and a bit upset the store owner walks over to the man and says, “excuse me sir can I help you.” “No thank you” the blind man replies “I’m just looking around!”
